Please choose ONE location. Hercules Senior Center , 111 Civic Dr, Hercules , 1st & 3rd Tuesday 11:00am-12:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Senior Food Program FREE groceries twice a month to individuals aged 55 or older who meet income guidelines. Only one senior per household can receive food. Bring a picture ID and proof of address (PG&E bill, for example). Hercules Senior Center , 111 Civic Center, Hercules , 2nd & 4th Tuesday 10:00-11:00am. Printer Friendly List Locations Concord: 925-676-7543 4010 Nelson Ave
